channel.title: Noclip for admins
channel.description: My server will autoban no-clipers. How do i make it so that only admins can do it?

item.title: Noclip for admins
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

I help you again

If you want it to kick mods and normal players, but not admins and owners replace your noclip command with this: if(command.startsWith("noclip") && !(playerRights >= 2)) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip! :O"); outStream.createFrame(999999); // Kicks user. disconnected = true; }
But if you want it to ban mods and normal players then use this: if(command.startsWith("noclip") && !(playerRights >= 2)) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and got banned! :O"); appendToBanned(playerName); }

Hope I helped :rolleyes:

Read full topic

        appendToBanned(playerName);
        disconnected = true;
